dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: A few days since the festival… Monika stands alone in the school’s music room.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: The Literature Club has been occupying the space a lot more since their recent club inductees introduced them all to singing-

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: -so much so that they often end up using the room more than the actual Music Club on occasions.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: With her moment alone, Monika reflects on everything that’s happened recently.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "It’s unreal just how… nice things have become."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I don’t know what I did to deserve a second chance, after everything I did before… but I know I’ll keep things right this time. For my friends."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Aha- back when it was just me left, I remember telling the one I love how I would’ve loved to have a rap artist join the club one day."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I didn’t expect that to actually happen, and for them to be the one to help save me and give me this extra chance. I can’t thank them enough."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Monika’s reflection is interrupted by the sound of footsteps entering the music room. A familiar pink-haired individual walked in.

dialogue.name: playcutscene
dialogue.string: showdad

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Ah, Natsuki! I’m surprised to see you here! I expected you and the others to still be in classes."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "I… I told my teacher I was taking a bathroom break. Though I actually left to go and find you."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "I’ve been thinking about… stuff… recently. I wanted to come talk with you about it."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I’m always all ears! What’s on your mind?"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "I… I feel like I can’t keep up with you guys."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Oh? In what way?"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "I had that feeling deep down for a while, even as far back as when it was just the four of us in the club."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Now that the club has grown to seven members, and with the singing on top of that… I feel like I can’t compete-!"

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Everyone feels so much better and refined at singing, and I just can’t stand out among all the voices."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "This club is one of the best things I’ve got right now as a comfortable place away from home, but this feeling of being overshadowed and thinking I have to try so hard to not be forgotten-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Natsuki- I can assure you, from the bottom of my heart, that you’re honestly one of our most stand-out writers and singers in the whole club!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I don’t think anyone can capture the unique style you bring to everything you do. And everyone knows it too!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "The impression you leave in the club is too special to be forgotten, and we’d never want to leave you out."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Natsuki crosses her arms and looks away with an unsure expression.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I can prove it, too! Here, why don’t we sing a quick song? I can assure you, once you start getting into your flow, you’ll see what makes you so special."
